TopicTitle: Stella Expansion - A Planet Pack for Kopernicus

Articles.Content:
A lot of you probably remember Kopernicus Core. Back in 0.24.2, there was no functioning planet mod. Kopernicus was in it's infancy, and all RSS could do was modify planets. I decided to combine the two, creating Kopernicus Core, a loosely held together set of configs to allow for adding new planets. Looking back, it was terrible. ScaledSpace didn't match up with PQS, and there were tons of other bugs.

Quite a lot of packs used it, though. OPM, Toliman, and my pack the Stella Expansion were some of the hits.

People liked Stella. It wasn't far from Kerbol, but you still needed a warp drive to get to it. There was also another star in the pack, Serious. (The names are based off the old PFCE star systems). I also dabbled in another star system, Lavinia.

I want to bring back Stella. I plan for full GN compatibility as Barnard's Star, Sirius, and Lalande 21185 analogs respectively.

Here's the current list of bodies:

Stella - A red-brown dwarf and one of the nearest stars to Kerbol/Sun.

Serious - A relatively close by white star, Serious is too big to be habitable, but it has cool planets regardless.

Lavinia - One of the nearest stars to Kerbol/Sun, Lavinia is a large red dwarf star with several planets.

Glyke - First planet of Lavinia. Scorched lava planet, only the night side can be landed on. 900 km radius.

Myke - Moon of Glyke. Asteroid only a few km wide and about 300 km from Glyke.

Iyke - Asteroid in quasi-satellite/resonant orbit with Glyke around Lavinia. Thought to be an escaped moon of Glyke. 60 km radius.

Theodenus - Second planet of Lavinia, large gas giant. Only a few close moons due to being a hot Jupiter (Jool).

Selara - Third planet of Lavinia, cool icy planet with water and thin oxygen atmosphere. Has 2 rotations for every orbit. 

That's all for now. I probably won't have anything available for a while, but look for progress soon!
